modName: CD Female Dragonscale Ebonsteel Armor Fixes
summary: This mod simply fixes a weird line in the mesh of the female Dragonscale Ebonsteel Grand Helm and Dragonscale Ebonsteel Grand Veiled Helm on the back of the horns. It also attaches the knee guards to the female Dragonscale Ebonsteel Boots.
descriptionHtml:
This mod simply fixes a weird line in the mesh of the female Dragonscale Ebonsteel Grand Helm and Dragonscale Ebonsteel Grand Veiled Helm on the back of the horns. It also attaches knee guards to the female Dragonscale Ebonsteel Boots. Small fixes yes I know.

[center][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/65163-1-1430165301.png[/img][/center]

Meshes were altered to fix the weird line on the horns for the helm and to attach the knee guards to the boots.

One of the following mods is required for this fix mod to work as there are no textures only the fixed meshes.
Dragonbone Ebonsteel Armor by Dreogan ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24941/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24941/?[/url])
Immersive Armors by hothtrooper44 ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733/?[/url])
If you use either of these awesome mods be sure to endorse them.

Simply extract the Meshes folder from the archive inside your Skyrim Data directory. Nexus Mod Manager and Mod Organizer will also work. I highly suggest Mod Organizer, there may be a learning curve to using it but it is worth it.

Permissions: You can do whatever you feel like with this mod, except make money.

My other mods :
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63978/?]CD Nord Ygritte Snow-Crowned Follower[/url]Â  - My Ygritte Snow-Crowned character as a follower
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63937/?]CD Nord Ygritte Snow-Crowned Racemenu Preset[/url] - Play as my newest character, Ygritte Snow-Crowned
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31129/?]CD Slower Werewolf Perk Points[/url] - Gain werewolf perk points at a slower rate
author: caldurham
